RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 1M Turf CR: 60. Maiden Claiming Purse 14000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $12,500. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BUCK'S GLORY broke in good order, dueled up front in the two path, narrowly showed the way into the far turn, was challenged by a pair of foes soon after from the outside, second duel midway on that bend, fell back off the clear into the straight, rebid from the inside when straightened for home, proved best in a game effort. NEPHI broke well, raced a bit keen past the wire the first time, moved out, four wide bid into the far turn, clear with a quarter to run, was reengaged by the winner nearing midstretch, outkicked by that one to the wire. SPICE OF MY LIFE moved off the inside first turn, raced in mid pack, moved closer while saving ground into the lane, proved no match for the top two the final furlong, clear of the others. ANGOLA VACATION broke back, lacked speed, dropped inside far turn, steered back out turning into the straight, improved position with some belated interest. FLYING CAROLINA in the second flight toward the inside, advanced and lodged a brief bid while three wide and between foes inside the runner up into the far turn, began to fade soon after. EASY EDDIE A back off the pace while saving ground early, continued toward the inside in the run up the backstretch, came in the two path for the drive, went one paced to the wire. LORD HELP ME last away, void of speed, continued well back through the second turn, picked off a couple of tiring rivals after the issue had been decided. BOSS MAN ZONG broke on top, dueled up front along the inside, gave way into the far turn. FREE FALLING NATE fell back to trail after the start, was always outrun. LAMONT settled in mid pack, stopped after five furlongs.

ENTRY.NAME: Easy Eddie A
ENTRY.OWNER: Ardoin Farms LLC and Prejean Raymond
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, one paced off rail stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Nephi
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well, keen inside,moved out, 4w bid, clear, outkicked late

ENTRY.NAME: Angola Vacation
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, lacked speed, dropped inside 3/8, back out,improved

ENTRY.NAME: Spice of My Life
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved out 1st turn, mid pack, closer inside, no match top two

ENTRY.NAME: Lord Help Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, void of speed, passed tiring foes

ENTRY.NAME: Flying Carolina
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, brief bid 3w btwn, fell back

ENTRY.NAME: Boss Man Zong
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, gave way far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Free Falling Nate
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, always outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Lamont
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, stopped after five furlongs

ENTRY.NAME: Buck's Glory
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled up front 2p, 2nd duel far turn, fell back, came again,game

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Clear Creek Stud LLC & Warren J. Harang

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 11500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JULY 14, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 14, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Cl aiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GEORGIA DAWN stalked the early leader in the three path, went after that rival far turn, bid entering the stretch, dueled to the wire, headed late, dug in late to narrowly prevail in game fashion. J Z'S FIRST last to leave, trailed early while saving ground, angled out four wide when moving smartly late in the final turn, collared the two leaders with a furlong to run, late duel, put a head in front in the waning strides then was outgamed at the wire. HARLANS WARRIOR cleared soon after the start, set the pace while rating along the inside, continued to hold a daylight advantage second turn, briefly responded when the winner challenged entering the stretch, caved late, saved the show late. HERE COMES LOVIE back off the pace, improved three wide into the stretch, failed to sustain that advance through the lane, not enough late for the show. SIMPLE PLEASURE broke on top, quickly fell back, continued to lag up the backstretch, improved position from between rivals while not a serious threat. LAKE RUNNER one paced throughout in lacking a closing response. BEYOND D'ORO five wide through the first turn, continued wide up the backstretch, five wide again second turn, remained back. TAPIT'S LADY chased the early leader, began a steady retreat after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Harlans Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: cleared, rated middle half, responded, caved late

ENTRY.NAME: Tapit's Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, steady retreat

ENTRY.NAME: Simple Pleasure
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, fell back, improved bit between foes

ENTRY.NAME: J Z's First
ENTRY.COMMENT: last to leave,trailed,4w 1/4,bid,led late, outgamed final strides

ENTRY.NAME: Georgia Dawn
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3w, bid entering stretch, dueled to wire,headed late,game

ENTRY.NAME: Here Comes Lovie
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, improved 3w, flattened out, not enuf 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Beyond d'Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w first turn, continued wide, 5w again 2nd turn, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Lake Runner
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced throughout in lacking a closing response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 1M Turf CR: 77. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $12,500. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BROKEN PROPOSAL tracked the leader along the inside early, shuffled back along the rail late backstretch, moved out, raced three wide into the stretch, closed with good resolve to be up in time while holding off the runner up. MSCHITCHATTOUR lacked speed for five furlongs, was four wide out of the final turn, roused, coming late while widest through the lane. COINMAKER off a step slow, moved out, advanced to challenge on the outside late backstretch, held a narrow advantage through the final turn and past the furlong marker, caught late. MADISON'S SCREEN within striking distance early, bid after a half, dueled inside upper stretch, faltered late. IRON BANNER away well, was clear early in setting the pace, continued to show the way early backstretch, was joined by a pair of foes just before a half, vied into the far turn closest to the inside and began to falter. BARBIE WARS fell back to trail after the start, always outrun in showing little.

ENTRY.NAME: Broken Proposal
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leader inside, shuffled 1/2,moved out 3w, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Mschitchattour
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 4w into lane, coming outside

ENTRY.NAME: Barbie Wars
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, showed little

ENTRY.NAME: Coinmaker
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, moved outside, bid, dueled, led, caught late

ENTRY.NAME: Iron Banner
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, clear early, pace, vied into 2nd turn, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Madison's Screen
ENTRY.OWNER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, closer after half, dueled,weakened late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 5F Dirt CR: 63. Maiden Special Weight Purse 34000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STORMY VALENTINE broke on top, clear before a furlong in hand, continued under restraint when maintaining daylight into the stretch, drew out through the lane without being asked for her best. TONI'S M also away in good order, chased the winner in vain throughout, had little for that one through the lane, clearly second best. CAROLINA JACY back off the pace outside, four wide through the turn when beginning to mount a mild rally, proved no match for the top two, gained the nod for the show. NICELY UNIFIED went one paced off the inside, late bid for the show, missed. REQUITE THE EFFORT within striking distance, gave way through the stretch. TOP CON settled in mid pack early, had little for the drive. SANDY AUSTIN shied from between horses to race greenly early, trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Requite the Effort
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, gave way stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Nicely Unified
ENTRY.OWNER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced off rail, narrowly missed the show

ENTRY.NAME: Toni's M
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased in vain, clearly 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Stormy Valentine
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, cleared in hand, drew out stretch, handily

ENTRY.NAME: Top Con
ENTRY.OWNER: GM Assets LLC and Meche Shane
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, little left drive

ENTRY.NAME: Sandy Austin
ENTRY.COMMENT: shied, greenly after break, trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Carolina Jacy
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, 4w turn, no match top two, nod show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 5F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 10000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JANUARY 14, 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JULY 14, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 14, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since May 14, 2 023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DOUBLE BARREL MAN fell back from between horses after the start, moved out widest into the turn,circled five to six wide into contention exiting the turn, bid, drove clear. BUNKIE'S SONG back off the pace and the inside, four wide into the lane, fell back in some traffic nearing the furlong marker, moved out a bit, rallied and finished up willingly to garner the place. MUCHO MARVIN lacked speed, asked along while five wide and between horses turning into the stretch, improved to be closest to the winner inside that one past the furlong marker, outkicked late for the place. WAR SONG in mid pack, bit closer into the lane toward the inside, in tight then checked up with a furlong remaining, recovered and displayed some late interest to improve. TRIPPER JOHN close early from the outside, dueled through the turn, weakened in the final furlong. CURTIN'S UP took command after the start, dueled up front closest to the inside through the bend, also began to falter in midstretch. PERFECT PERIGEE last away, trailed most of the way, failed to menace. GRAND PRADO forwardly placed early, was weakening when in traffic along the inside midstretch, trailed home.

ENTRY.NAME: War Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, back, tight, checked up 1/4, willing

ENTRY.NAME: Perfect Perigee
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed, failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Mucho Marvin
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, asked 5w and btwn into lane, outkicked 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Double Barrel Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back, moved out, circled 5-6w into lane, bid, driving

ENTRY.NAME: Bunkie's Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, 4w into lane, traffic 1/8, rallied 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Prado
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed early, traffic 1/8 when weakening

ENTRY.NAME: Curtin's Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: took command after start, dueled inside, faltered final furlong

ENTRY.NAME: Tripper John
ENTRY.COMMENT: close early outside, dueled late turn, weakened final furlong

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 5F Dirt CR: 57. Maiden Special Weight Purse 34000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DIAMOND DEAL bothered at the start to spot the field a couple of lengths, moved out widest and was six wide into the turn, advanced while five wide into the lane, took over and drove well clear as much the best. REAL DEAL RYAN forwardly placed off the inside, continued to prompt the issue through the turn three wide, lost some ground to the pacesetting runner up into the lane, caught that one late for the runner up position while no match for the winner. BUCKSKIN JERRY took command after the start, set the pace along the inside for three furlongs, offered little resistance to the winner entering the lane, caught late for the place. EMILYHASHERTURN forwardly placed, raced five wide into the turn and inside the winner, had little left for the stretch run. BELLAMYSAWESOMEDAY fell back to trail after the start, improved slightly without posing a serious threat. DARK SKYER broke out to bother the winner, main body and four wide into the turn, faded. MISS JAN vied up front in the two path and between foes, gave way early in the turn, continued to fade through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Buckskin Jerry
ENTRY.OWNER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.
ENTRY.COMMENT: took command after start, pace for 3/8,. no match,caught 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Jan
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early 2p, gave way turn

ENTRY.NAME: Bellamysawesomeday
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, improved slightly, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Real Deal Ryan
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, no match, up late 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Dark Skyer
ENTRY.OWNER: Stumpf Donna and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, bothered foe, main body, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Diamond Deal
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered brk, back, 6-5w advance turn, drove clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Adcock's Red River Farm, LLC & J. Adcock

ENTRY.NAME: Emilyhasherturn
ENTRY.OWNER: Friends of Racing Club LLC and Cleek Phillip
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, 5w into turn, little left drive

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 1 1/16M Turf CR: 94. Claiming Purse 21000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE OCTOBER 14, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over On The Turf Since June 14, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claimi ng Price $25,000, For Each $2,500 To $20,000 2 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight And Eligibility). (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MANGELSEN broke on top, showed the way out of the chute, rated kindly the middle half, extended his advantage into the stretch, enough left to hold the runner up safe late while inside that one at the wire. PARROT HEAD settled off the pace while in a bit of traffic into the first turn, moved closer off the inside after a half, came three wide for the drive, steadily getting to the winner late while well clear for the second spot. SNIVELING raced in mid pace, asked along between horses far turn, swung out widest for the drive, staged a mild rally down the middle of the course to be along for the show. DREWPOWER tucked inside onto the main course, continued to race unhurried, asked along second turn, split foes into the stretch, improved position. WHEN'S TEE TIME forwardly placed out of the chute, chased the winner the middle half, had little left for the stretch drive. ONE TIME GEM prompted the winner early, fell back to mid pack before a half, went evenly through the lane in lacking a rally. GET THEM JUSTIN four wide when off the pace into the first turn, failed to muster a rally. EYE DEE KAY broke back and was never a threat. THUNDERSHOOK last to leave, fell further and further back, distanced, jogged in.

ENTRY.NAME: Eye Dee Kay
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, never a threat

ENTRY.NAME: Sniveling
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack off rail, asked far turn, swung widest, mild rally

ENTRY.NAME: Mangelsen
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, pace in hand, extended, enuf left late

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Cynthia G. Eyre & Wendell A. Templet

ENTRY.NAME: Thundershook
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, fell far back, distanced

ENTRY.NAME: Get Them Justin
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w 1st turn, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Parrot Head
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, closer after a half, 3w into lane, gaining

ENTRY.NAME: One Time Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted early pace, fell back, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: When's Tee Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, chased middle half, little left

ENTRY.NAME: Drewpower
ENTRY.COMMENT: tucked inside, lacked speed, split foes into lane, improved bit

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 36000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 14, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden And Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AUTUMNS STRONG MAN broke with leaders, headed up second flight early off the inside, closer three wide turn, roused turning for home, reeled in leader under steady handling, edged clear late. SCOOTERIA asked along early to maintain inside position, dueled into the turn, shook clear, extended that advantage into the stretch, could not contain the winner while holding sway for the place. DREWMAZING void of speed early, continued to lag well back through the turn, three wide entering the stretch, roused, late run to be going best of all at the end. SONO broke on top, dueled outside the runner up in the run up the backstretch, chased that one through the turn and into the lane, gradually weakened through the lane. MOR BIG LEE well back off the early pace, dropped to the inside through the turn, came up empty for the drive. TAMBOURINE STAR in the second flight while four wide into the turn, backed up in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Drewmazing
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, continued to lag, roused upper, late run,willing

ENTRY.NAME: Autumns Strong Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: headed up 2nd flight, closer 3w turn, roused, reeled in leader

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.

ENTRY.NAME: Scooteria
ENTRY.COMMENT: asked along, dueled early, shook clear, reeled in late

ENTRY.NAME: Sono
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early 2p, chased turn, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Mor Big Lee
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, moved inside turn, empty drive

ENTRY.NAME: Tambourine Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight four wide into the turn, backed up drive

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 6F Dirt CR: 63. Maiden Claiming Purse 10000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHILI RED forwardly placed from the start outside, parked six wide through the turn, put a head in front when straightened for home, drew well clear to be much the best. ASTERN BANKER in mid pack while toward the inside up the backstretch, waited behind traffic late in the turn, shifted out for room when straightened for home, rallied to be clear for the place, no threat to the winner. MIDNIGHT CROWN broke well, pressed the issue early while between horses, vied between rivals through the turn, chased the winner past the furlong marker, caught late for the place. COLE'S SENSATION broke back, roused in the five path into the lane, improved position through some traffic. STRAY CAT STRUT within striking distance, vied five through the turn and inside the winner, weakened in the drive. SACRED NATION last to leave, well back for a half while saving ground, moved out, passed tiring rivals while not a serious threat. ASTROLOGY WONOWON raced with the early pace, vied between rivals through the turn, gave way in the drive. TRUVY'S BANDIT forwardly placed well off the inside, with the pace four wide and between horses turn, tired through the stretch. VERDUNVILLE broke back, never menaced. UNCLE CHAN forwardly placed in the early going off the rail, faded. GLITTER STORM flashed early foot along the inside, stopped turning for home, well back.

ENTRY.NAME: Glitter Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: flashed speed inside, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Sacred Nation
ENTRY.OWNER: ELCO Racing LLC and Gallineau Dwayne
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed, passed tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Astern Banker
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack inside, traffic late turn, shifted out, up 2nd, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Verdunville
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, never menaced

ENTRY.NAME: Astrology Wonowon
ENTRY.COMMENT: with the pace, vied btwn foes turn, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Crown
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well, pressed between horses, chased 1/8, caught 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Cole's Sensation
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, roused 5w into lane, improved thru traffic

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Chan
ENTRY.COMMENT: toward the front early, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Truvy's Bandit
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward and well off rail, vied 4w turn, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Stray Cat Strut
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, vied 5w turn, weakened bit

ENTRY.NAME: Chili Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward, parked 6w turn, took over, kicked well clear
